text: 3:12 1 Atriviba 4:29-31; Fofozir Gumazim 1:16Kamaghɨn amizɨ, kɨ guizbangɨra, bizir nɨ uabɨ danɨngasa nan azangsɨzim, kɨ a isɨ nɨ danɨngam. Kɨ datɨrɨghɨn nɨghnɨzir aghuim ko fofozir aghuim nɨ danɨngam. Gumazitam fomɨra fofozir kamagh garitam itir puvatɨ, egh uaghan gɨn gumazitam fofozir kamagh garitam ikian kogham.
